Select a section below to review your ROI

To calculate your return on investment, begin with the first section below. The information entered therein will automatically populate corresponding fields in the other sections. You will be able to move from section to section to add and/or adjust values to best reflect your organization and process. To return to this screen, click the ROI Dashboard button to the left.

Claim Payments$0
Claim Payments
Sparta Science has a proven track record of reducing insurance claims related to musculoskeletal health.
20% of pro sports payroll is lost to absenteeism.

We can look at different parameters in Sparta and see the profiles that place a person in risk. We have the ability then to put in place a program to appropriately minimize that risk.

- Dr. Brian Sennett MD Head Physician and Orthopedic Surgeon, University of Pennsylvania

After using Sparta now for 3 years, the big picture tells us we have maintained an on-field training compliance above 90% for the past two seasons and reduced injuries to a record low.

- Haydn Masters, Head of Performance, Australia Wallabies

Sparta does a great job of singling out three pieces of information that helps us hone in on what will keep our athletes on the field.

- Frank Wintrich, Director of Football Performance, UCLA

Assessment Time Savings0 hours
Assessment Time Savings

How much time does the FMS take to understand your team's MSK health? How many staff members do you have running athletes through the assessment? Is the data really reliable and objective? How often are you assessing? These are just some of the questions to think about when considering innovation in health assessment technologies over the past few years. Sparta Science provides an objective diagnostic tool that can assess an individual's MSK health in 90 seconds. This can be done on a monthly or quarterly basis to stay current, and the athletes are provided with a personalized corrective plan to improve their results.
20% of pro sports payroll is lost to absenteeism.

We can look at different parameters in Sparta and see the profiles that place a person in risk. We have the ability then to put in place a program to appropriately minimize that risk.
